XII.i.4.C.1.g
.
Handling Cases With No Potential Entitlement to SBP
If there is no potential entitlement to SBP, the claims processor should enter
No SBP payable
in the REMARKS field of the DIC award.
Note
:  If there are any questions as to whether or not SBP is payable and coordination is required because the payment date for DIC is prior to January 1, 2023, then take action as described in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 4.C.2.d
.
Reference
:  For more information on
determining whether the surviving spouse is entitled to receive the
full amount of
SBP and DIC benefits, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 4.C.1.b
.
